pr_title: [Enhancement] Fetch latest submission for instructor code editor

timeline.message: Fetch submission for result when fetching the solution/template participation
Also fetch latest submission for student result

timeline.body:
this could be in a new line
```suggestion
            + "left join fetch tpr.submission left join fetch spr.submission "
            + "where pe.id = :#{#exerciseId} and (tpr.id = (select max(id) from tp.results) or tpr.id = null) "
```
timeline.bodyText:
this could be in a new line
  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        + "left join fetch tpr.submission left join fetch spr.submission " + "where pe.id = :#{#exerciseId} and (tpr.id = (select max(id) from tp.results) or tpr.id = null) "
          
          
            
                        + "left join fetch tpr.submission left join fetch spr.submission "

timeline.bodyHTML:
this could be in a new line

Suggested change
+ "left join fetch tpr.submission left join fetch spr.submission " + "where pe.id = :#{#exerciseId} and (tpr.id = (select max(id) from tp.results) or tpr.id = null) "
+ "left join fetch tpr.submission left join fetch spr.submission "
+ "where pe.id = :#{#exerciseId} and (tpr.id = (select max(id) from tp.results) or tpr.id = null) "
